mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_api_stnd.select */ SELECT svr_id /* svr_id 서버_ID character varying(20) */ ,svr_nm /* svr_nm 서버_명 character varying(100) */ ,api_url /* api_url API_URL character varying(200) */ ,gps_base_cycl /* gps_base_cycl GPS정기핑_기본_주기 numeric */ ,gps_next_cycl /* gps_next_cycl GPS정기핑_다음_주기 numeric */ ,rdet_next_cycl /* rdet_next_cycl 정기판정_다음_주기 numeric */ ,rdet_base_cycl /* rdet_base_cycl 정기판정_기본_주기 numeric */ ,led_slep_tcnt /* led_slep_tcnt LED_슬립_시간 numeric */ ,msor_ssng_levl /* msor_ssng_levl 모션센서_감지_레벨 numeric */ ,hsor_isng_cycl /* hsor_isng_cycl 심박센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,tsor_isng_cycl /* tsor_isng_cycl 체온센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,tsor_evnt_minval /* tsor_evnt_minval 체온센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,tsor_evnt_maxval /* tsor_evnt_maxval 체온센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,hbitcnt_mdan_minval /* hbitcnt_mdan_minval 심박수_중간값_하한값 numeric */ ,hbitcnt_mdan_maxval /* hbitcnt_mdan_maxval 심박수_중간값_상한값 numeric */ ,msor_evnt_minval /* msor_evnt_minval 모션센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,msor_evnt_maxval /* msor_evnt_maxval 모션센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tc_api_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND svr_id = #{svrId} /* svr_id 서버_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_api_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO tc_api_stnd ( svr_id /* svr_id 서버_ID character varying(20) */
,svr_nm /* svr_nm 서버_명 character varying(100) */
,api_url /* api_url API_URL character varying(200) */
,gps_base_cycl /* gps_base_cycl GPS정기핑_기본_주기 numeric */ ,gps_next_cycl /* gps_next_cycl GPS정기핑_다음_주기 numeric */ ,rdet_next_cycl /* rdet_next_cycl 정기판정_다음_주기 numeric */ ,rdet_base_cycl /* rdet_base_cycl 정기판정_기본_주기 numeric */ ,led_slep_tcnt /* led_slep_tcnt LED_슬립_시간 numeric */ ,msor_ssng_levl /* msor_ssng_levl 모션센서_감지_레벨 numeric */ ,hsor_isng_cycl /* hsor_isng_cycl 심박센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,tsor_isng_cycl /* tsor_isng_cycl 체온센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,tsor_evnt_minval /* tsor_evnt_minval 체온센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,tsor_evnt_maxval /* tsor_evnt_maxval 체온센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,hbitcnt_mdan_minval /* hbitcnt_mdan_minval 심박수_중간값_하한값 numeric */ ,hbitcnt_mdan_maxval /* hbitcnt_mdan_maxval 심박수_중간값_상한값 numeric */ ,msor_evnt_minval /* msor_evnt_minval 모션센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,msor_evnt_maxval /* msor_evnt_maxval 모션센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{svrId} /* svr_id 서버_ID character varying(20) */
,#{svrNm} /* svr_nm 서버_명 character varying(100) */
,#{apiUrl} /* api_url API_URL character varying(200) */
,#{gpsBaseCycl} /* gps_base_cycl GPS정기핑_기본_주기 numeric */ ,#{gpsNextCycl} /* gps_next_cycl GPS정기핑_다음_주기 numeric */ ,#{rdetNextCycl} /* rdet_next_cycl 정기판정_다음_주기 numeric */ ,#{rdetBaseCycl} /* rdet_base_cycl 정기판정_기본_주기 numeric */ ,#{ledSlepTcnt} /* led_slep_tcnt LED_슬립_시간 numeric */ ,#{msorSsngLevl} /* msor_ssng_levl 모션센서_감지_레벨 numeric */ ,#{hsorIsngCycl} /* hsor_isng_cycl 심박센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,#{tsorIsngCycl} /* tsor_isng_cycl 체온센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */ ,#{tsorEvntMinval} /* tsor_evnt_minval 체온센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,#{tsorEvntMaxval} /* tsor_evnt_maxval 체온센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,#{hbitcntMdanMinval} /* hbitcnt_mdan_minval 심박수_중간값_하한값 numeric */ ,#{hbitcntMdanMaxval} /* hbitcnt_mdan_maxval 심박수_중간값_상한값 numeric */ ,#{msorEvntMinval} /* msor_evnt_minval 모션센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */ ,#{msorEvntMaxval} /* msor_evnt_maxval 모션센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_api_stnd.update */ UPDATE tc_api_stnd
,svr_nm = #{svrNm} /* svr_nm 서버_명 character varying(100) */
,api_url = #{apiUrl} /* api_url API_URL character varying(200) */
,gps_base_cycl = #{gpsBaseCycl} /* gps_base_cycl GPS정기핑_기본_주기 numeric */
,gps_next_cycl = #{gpsNextCycl} /* gps_next_cycl GPS정기핑_다음_주기 numeric */
,rdet_next_cycl = #{rdetNextCycl} /* rdet_next_cycl 정기판정_다음_주기 numeric */
,rdet_base_cycl = #{rdetBaseCycl} /* rdet_base_cycl 정기판정_기본_주기 numeric */
,led_slep_tcnt = #{ledSlepTcnt} /* led_slep_tcnt LED_슬립_시간 numeric */
,msor_ssng_levl = #{msorSsngLevl} /* msor_ssng_levl 모션센서_감지_레벨 numeric */
,hsor_isng_cycl = #{hsorIsngCycl} /* hsor_isng_cycl 심박센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */
,tsor_isng_cycl = #{tsorIsngCycl} /* tsor_isng_cycl 체온센서_내부감지_주기 numeric */
,tsor_evnt_minval = #{tsorEvntMinval} /* tsor_evnt_minval 체온센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */
,tsor_evnt_maxval = #{tsorEvntMaxval} /* tsor_evnt_maxval 체온센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */
,hbitcnt_mdan_minval = #{hbitcntMdanMinval} /* hbitcnt_mdan_minval 심박수_중간값_하한값 numeric */
,hbitcnt_mdan_maxval = #{hbitcntMdanMaxval} /* hbitcnt_mdan_maxval 심박수_중간값_상한값 numeric */
,msor_evnt_minval = #{msorEvntMinval} /* msor_evnt_minval 모션센서_이벤트_하한값 numeric */
,msor_evnt_maxval = #{msorEvntMaxval} /* msor_evnt_maxval 모션센서_이벤트_상한값 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND svr_id = #{svrId} /* svr_id 서버_ID character varying(20) */
